title: Research-Based Earth Science (MPG) Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geology and chemistry concepts
context.additional_context: Conducting field research and data analysis projects using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts in mineralogy, petrology, and geochemistry (MPG) by applying them to project-based contexts.
Through team-based investigative activities, learners can analyze real geological samples and develop data interpretation skills.
Learners can acquire skills in writing scientific reports and delivering presentations using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
